mapper.insert:
select PET_seq.nextval from dual
insert into PET (petindex, userid, mcategory, scategory, petname, sex, age, petsize, weight, hlength, nstate, petimg, memo) values( #{petindex}, #{userid}, #{mcategory}, #{scategory}, #{petname}, #{sex}, #{age}, #{petsize}, #{weight}, #{hlength}, #{nstate}, #{petimg}, #{memo} )
mapper.select: select p.*, s.SCANAME as scaname, m.MCANAME as mcaname, u.nick as nick from PET p left outer join Members u on p.userid = u.userid left outer join SUBCATEGORY s on p.SCATEGORY = s.SCATEGORY left outer join MAINCATEGORY m on p.MCATEGORY = m.MCATEGORY where petindex = #{petindex}
